actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to permit the vessel Manatra II to be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel.

summary.text: Authorizes the inspection, licensing, and operation of the vessel Manatra II as a passenger-carrying vessel for as long as such vessel remains under the continuous ownership of the Marine Navigation and Training Association of Chicago, Illinois.

titles.title: A bill to permit the vessel Manatra II to be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel.
